posts.post_title: FS : 1895 JOHN WARD Newsboy Cabinet  SGC  --> SOLD
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Misunderestimated (Brian H.)
SOLD

JOHN M WARD (HOF) 1895 N566 Newsboy Cabinet (Bat at Side)  SGC A graded Authentic -- I don't recall precisely why this was graded "A" (authentic) instead of an SGC 10 or something.
The scans ae a bit higher resolution than I usually use.
SOLD 
 insurance/registered mailing included. Paypal accepted with no extra charge.

The first to contact me at bhodes@rcn.com accepting this offer (ie price) has priority -- not whomever posts here first or whomever first requests 
another scan or something.
